name: Restrict Login to Invalid Credentials
fullName: Login Action: Restrict Login to Invalid Credentials

steps.name: Given  User with invalid Credentials navigates to Login Page
When  User enters invalid Username "admin", invalid Password "user" and RememberMe "true"
Then  Page will display message "Failed to sign in!"
